channel.title: Ipban a player that changes ip
channel.description: I hear I can ipban without even logging in.

item.title: Ipban a player that changes ip
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“Beastly¿, post:9, topic:292249”]Ok…SYI blocker…that won’t really help when you have AFG bot as well as a Ip changing guy…Have you tried to turn off your server for a bit, then see if he stopped? Try to Ipban the Main person SYIing and AFG Botting. Might stop all the SYI’s.[/quote]It’s good now I think he quit, shut it off over night

Read full topic
